benchmark_details.name: ChartInsights
benchmark_details.overview: ChartInsights is a newly curated dataset specifically designed for evaluating low-level Chart Question Answering (ChartQA) tasks, consisting of 22,347 samples covering 10 data analysis tasks across 7 chart types.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the effectiveness of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) on low-level chart question answering tasks.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Limited to specific chart types and low-level tasks.

data.source: Curated from existing datasets like nvBench and ChartQA.
data.annotation: Automated generation and manual review of task-query pairs.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated as the ratio of correct answers to total questions.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracy rates indicate the strength of MLLMs in processing low-level ChartQA tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Average accuracy of tested models ranges from 39.8% to 84.32%.
methodology.validation: Validation conducted through testing a random 20% of the dataset.

harm: Potential misunderstanding of chart data due to hallucinations in MLLMs.
